text: This is a neighborhood gem. Had a delicious cappuccino, the smoked Arctic char and half of the Boxerman sandwich. It's delicious and elevated deli/bistro food. Loved it!!!
Belle ambiance. Plats très intéressants. Sommelier efficace et attentif. Super endroit pour retrouver des amis, dans un coin d'Outremont insolite.  Ma découvert de la semaine !

Petit bijou de resto!
Super sympa, personnel attentionné et chaleureux. Menu style tapas à partager. Bouffe complètement géniale!

The food and environment here are incredible. We ate outside and we allowed the chefs to bring us their best selection and it was way beyond what was expected. The wine they suggested was perfect to pair and overall it was our best meal while visiting for the long holiday weekend. For a nice, light, tasty, and unique dining experience, enjoy some dishes from Boxermans

Bouffe vraiment ordinaire, un service assez bon mais très peu convaincant. Mon amie a dû payer plus cher parce que la serveuse a dit qu'elleavait  supposément plus bu que d'autre. Bref, peu compréhensive et très peu aimable. Bouffe vraiment ordinaire pour 100$ par personne.

Great discovery !
I have been there during summer so I had dinner on their terrasse behind, it was really nice. Even the interior in beautiful. 
It is several tapas to share, I love those kind of restaurant. But here they know how to revisit common plate by mixing unusual flavors together. I spent my time being surprised.
Big plus: the ratio quality / price is really good 
I took 7 or 8 tapas, 1 beer & 1 glass of wine for 90$ with taxes and tips

Un jeune couple, une passion! Eating and drinking... well, in an elegant, fun environment. On y entre comme chez nous, avec un brin de folie, pour partager des plats intéressants , intrigants avec  mélanges de saveurs.. You have to try the broccoli, green bean,  pesto salad, but be sure you like garlic! J'aime l'ail mais là, ils en ont mis un peu, lire, beaucoup, trop. Bon choix de vins au verre, avec les conseils judicieux de la sommelière.

On est voisin,on aimerait donc aimer!pour le lunch.equipe sympathique et energique.a la limite du ME,mais la clientele(mac+iphone) est resoulument 100% ME.decor sobre,gris,bar,table communautaire,qques tables,acceui/caisse.pas de TdH,ni de special du jour.des petits plats,bien reussis techniquement,mais pas toujours gastronomiquement.la jeunesse?ije n'ai pas trouve le fil qui attache tout ça ensemble.vins bio,nature,importations privees,de belle qualite il me semble.l'ambiance -malgre les ordis et le niveau sonore parfois eleve,est tres syma,on se sent a l'aise(bon café) et on a envie de rester un peu plus longtemps.nous recommandons et nous suivrons l'evolution.
Great coffee, great ambiance, great service. Best coffee place on Van Horne.

Walking into this space on a Monday night, with its bricked wall, chic dark bar, and warm atmosphere, I was excited to snag a reservation at this Outremont bistro. It's literally one of the only hot spots that is open on a Monday night so yes, it was busy at 7:00 pm. As lovely as the indoor space was, we opted for the small terrace in the back of the restaurant. Although it doesn't have much of a view (basically overhead residential balconies and a parking lot), it is nice to have the option of outdoor seating. The tables were cozy and candlelit, and offered a relaxed feel. The music inside did get louder as the night progressed but the repertoire was awesome, and added to the neighbourhood hangout feel this space seems to have become. 

We were warmly seated and greeted by the wait staff who patiently explained the menu as well as the various wines on their list. The food menu was comprised of seasonal sharing plates, as well as a variety of side dishes including cheeses and charcuterie. In order to get the most of our experience, we opted for the platter option where they assemble a sample of their sides dishes including cheese, charcuterie, pickles, beets, olives and bread. As recommended, we also ordered three of the most popular sharing plates including the Boxermans sandwich, the tomato provençal, and the stuffed zucchini. From start to finish, the food was impeccable! Great flavour, perfectly executed, and great ingredients; you can taste the freshness of the produce. Three plates was much though after having such a big platter for an opener. The waiter was also bang on in recommending a great crisp and light white wine; loved that most of the wines are also available by the glass cause we finished that bottle fast! 

This place is my new coup de cur, offering great food at very reasonable prices, a great bar and drink selection, and a laid back feel in a beautiful setting; it doesn't get better!

Le Boxermans est un petit bijou de la rue Van Horne. C'est le genre d'endroit très agréable ou il fait bon de se rencontrer entre amis et ce, à toute heure de la journée parce que c'est ouvert matin, midi et soir! C'est le genre d'endroit que je côtoierais encore plus souvent si j'habitais plus proche. 

Le petit menu de plats à partager est excellent, et la carte de vin est toute aussi fantastique. L'ambiance est bonne peu importe si l'on mange à l'intérieur ou sur la terrace extérieur en été.

De bons plats à partager, des bons prix et DE L'AMBIANCE ENFIN! 

C'est en revenant à la simplicité qu'on réalise souvent les meilleurs coups. C'est le cas ici avec Boxermans. 

Les petits plats 'format entrée', tous entre 8 et 13$, revisitent les classiques français: burratas, tartare de bison et oeuf coulant, etc. Si les assiettes sont petites, on s'en sort avec 2-3 choix à la carte et leurs extras pour une modique somme si l'on est deux ou trois personnes. Le goût et le look y sont, ça c'est sûr! Je n'ai pas essayé les déjeuners, mais les venoiseries avaient l'air bonnes à leur allure ! 

Mais c'est surtout l'ambiance qui donne le goût d'y retourner. Le propriétaire Éric et ses employés sont accueillants et très sympathiques. La configuration de la pièce est faite de façon à socialiser facilement. On aime ! 

De la fraicheur dans cette extrémité du Mile-End souvent oubliée et désuette. ENFIN!

So happy this place exists. Its cozy and accommodating, the staff is very warm and always makes you feel welcome. Whether I need a table to work for an afternoon, have a quick drink or to celebrate birthday dinner, I've done all at this wonderful place. This versatility, along with great food and drink, is what makes Boxermans so special.

Très sympa petit café sur la rue van horne à Outremont le service est top et la nourriture aussi j'ai pris un café très tôt le matin mais ca me tente de revenir le soir pour un verre avec des amis . Les prix sont abordables
Sick atmosphere, it's very cozy and I dig the lighting. Great staff, they're always chill and make good conversation. Food is hit or miss, however.

Small menu with seasonal items. Fun option to make your own cheese and meat plate. AMAZING list of private importe sulfate free wine. Recco ordering 2-3 plates per person. Good for groups of 4 would not recommend larger. Great neighborhood ambiance. Perfect for a Saturday night dinner plan for a few hours.
